Instruction: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) and grease two baking sheets.
Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl and mix well.

Combine the sugar, flour, and oil in a pan; add the eggs, baking powder, and cinnamon. Stir in the orange juice, orange peel, and raisins, bringing it to a boil while stirring. Continue stirring for 2 minutes. Pour into a baking dish and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 45 to 50 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x13-inch baking dish thoroughly.
